description: Numbers n such that base 10 representation sum(d(i)*10^i; i=0,1,...,m), d(m)>0, has d(m)<=d(m-1)>=d(m-2)<=...
comments: The second digit must be greater than or equal to the first, the third digit must be less than or equal to the second, etc. - _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 08 2014
author: _Clark Kimberling_
